Hi,
I have 5 Dedibox kidéchire which are idling at the moment. You can have a machine for 5 euro / month  + paypal fees. This offer is only available for well known users @ LET.

Specs:      
Processor: 1x VIA® Nano® U2250 @ 1 core @1.6 Ghz x64, VT     
Memory: 2 GB DDR2      
HDD: 160 GB     
Network: 1 Gbit (unmetered, bandwith speed not guaranteed)   
Datacenter: DC3   
DDos-Protection: Basic    
IPv4: 1     
IPv6: /48     

I guarantee 6 months of use. After this period I may use the servers again for myself.

You have to agree to the ToS of online.net. Forbidden: Warez, illegal torrenting, TOR, spaming, hacking, cracking, network penetration, DDos, (child) pornography, IRC etc.

You will only get root access. If you want to install/reinstall an OS, reboot etc. I will do that for you over the panel. I can do this actions for you within 24 hours. You have to know what you do since I will not have the time to give you support or do panel actions all the time.

Feel free to ask me questions.
ecircuit.
